personal.bio:
Hey ðŸ‘‹
I'm Ayush, a product-driven professional with 3+ years of experience leading 0â†’1 journeys across FinTech (Vance Inc.) and EdTech (Exampeer), plus my own venture BrightBunny. I specialize in GTM strategies, user research loops, and cross-functional execution that drives real impact. Recent product work was recognized by Truecaller's team for strategic depth and user-first thinking. Currently a Product Management Fellow at Product Space, I love solving complex problems with structured thinking and turning insights into meaningful user engagement.

achievements: Product Management Fellow at Product Space (2025)
Recognition from Truecaller product team for strategic execution
Led 0â†’1 products with 30%+ engagement lift and 20% conversion boost

experience.description: Cohort-based PM fellowship focused on 0â†’1 execution. Led 2 product sprints (B2C & SaaS) from research to GTM; one solution earned recognition from Truecaller's product team for strategy and execution, driving 30%+ engagement lift.

Led 0â†’1 B2B sales pipeline by identifying high-conversion segments and informing product-market fit. Drove 20% increase in lead conversion and 15% faster onboarding via GTM experiments and user funnel analysis.
Boosted customer engagement by 30% through landing page optimization and friction-point removal via user journey mapping. Improved dev cycle efficiency by 15% by streamlining cross-team coordination.

Led market and competitor analysis across 10+ players and 3 key user cohorts, improving positioning clarity and boosting demo-to-signup conversion by 25%. Built user feedback loops leading to 3+ UX improvements and 20% boost in task completion.

projects.title: QwikPik - AI Shopping Assistant

projects.title: Nykaa Virtual Try-On - AR Makeup Experience
projects.description: Developed an immersive AR virtual try-on experience for Nykaa's lipstick collection, enabling users to test makeup products digitally before purchase. Built as a learning project to explore AR technology integration, computer vision, and beauty-tech user experience patterns.
highlights: Self-initiated exploration of AR technology in beauty-tech space
Built realistic lipstick virtual try-on with camera integration
Implemented multiple shade selection and real-time application
Designed authentic Nykaa brand experience with signature pink theme
Explored computer vision techniques for facial feature detection
Demonstrated understanding of beauty industry UX patterns

impact.learningGoal: Explore AR technology integration and beauty-tech user experience design
impact.technicalOutcome: Functional virtual try-on application with real-time makeup application
impact.skillsDemonstrated: AR development, computer vision integration, beauty-tech UX, brand-authentic design

keyFeatures: Real-time camera feed integration for live AR experience
Multiple lipstick shade selection with Nykaa product range
Computer vision-based lip detection and tracking
Realistic makeup application with blending and color accuracy
Nykaa brand-authentic interface design (signature #FF1774 pink)
Mobile-responsive design optimized for beauty shopping experience

technicalApproach.arImplementation: WebRTC camera integration with Canvas API for real-time makeup overlay
technicalApproach.computerVision: Facial feature detection for accurate lip positioning and tracking
technicalApproach.designSystem: Nykaa brand guidelines integration with signature pink theme and beauty-focused UX
technicalApproach.learningFocus: Understanding AR technology potential for reducing beauty product return rates and enhancing digital shopping confidence

projects.title: AI Order Assistant - n8n Workflow Automation
projects.description: Built an end-to-end AI workflow automation using n8n.io and Telegram Bot API to demonstrate conversational AI capabilities for e-commerce order management. Created as a learning project to explore workflow orchestration, natural language processing, and chatbot UX design patterns.
highlights: Self-directed learning project exploring AI workflow automation
Built complex n8n workflow with 12-15 orchestrated nodes
Implemented intent recognition and entity extraction for order queries
Designed multi-turn conversation flows with context persistence
Created scalable architecture demonstrating production-ready patterns
Showcased ability to bridge AI capabilities with practical business applications

impact.learningGoal: Explore workflow automation and conversational AI design patterns
impact.technicalOutcome: Functional Telegram bot demonstrating AI integration and automation orchestration
impact.skillsDemonstrated: End-to-end automation design, AI/NLP implementation, conversational UX, technical architecture

keyFeatures: Natural language processing for order-related queries
Context-aware conversation management across multiple turns
Error handling with graceful fallback mechanisms
Workflow transparency showing automation process steps
Scalable architecture patterns for e-commerce automation
Integration demonstration between AI services and messaging platforms

technicalApproach.workflowComplexity: 12-15 nodes including triggers, AI processing, data logic, and response formatting
technicalApproach.aiCapabilities: Intent recognition, entity extraction, context retention, conversation flow management
technicalApproach.architectureDesign: Modular workflow structure demonstrating production-ready automation patterns
technicalApproach.learningFocus: Exploring how AI can streamline repetitive business processes through intelligent automation

projects.title: Truecaller One-Tap Verification Feature Analysis
projects.description: In-depth analysis of Truecaller's One-Tap User Verification SDK aimed at enabling frictionless onboarding and OTP-less checkout for mobile-first users, especially in Tier 2/3 markets. Assessed user pain points, business impact, and outlined monetization and co-marketing strategies to accelerate adoption in the Indian e-commerce and fintech ecosystems.
metrics: 25-30% OTP verification drop-off rate in target apps
Up to 20% increase in user onboarding with SDK integration
15% uplift in checkout completion rates post-deployment
30% reduction in RTO fraud losses for partners
highlights: Quantified critical friction points causing high drop-offs during OTP verification across Indian digital apps
Mapped user journey highlighting pain points in Tier 2/3 markets with network and device challenges
Outlined key business benefits including onboarding uplift, fraud reduction, cost savings, and brand trust
Presented monetization opportunities leveraging ancillary Truecaller solutions across authentication, user leads, and checkout
Recommended co-marketing and developer engagement strategies to accelerate ecosystem adoption
Proposed success metrics to measure impact on conversion, retention, fraud reduction, and operational efficiency

impact.businessOutcome: Strategic roadmap for Truecaller SDK adoption maximizing onboarding, reducing fraud, and boosting partner revenue
impact.userOutcome: Enabling seamless, trustworthy authentication experiences improving digital service access and retention
impact.skillsDemonstrated: Product research, GTM strategy, business case development, stakeholder alignment

keyFeatures: User pain-point and drop-off analysis focused on OTP friction and SDK implementation impact
Business case quantification of fraud, RTO, and cost reduction benefits
Market opportunity sizing covering e-commerce growth and mobile-first user segments
Monetization modeling across SDK deployments and ancillary products
Ecosystem development strategy including hackathons, co-marketing, and partner collaborations
Defining KPIs for adoption tracking and continuous improvement

projects.title: FanCode Playback Continuity & Multi-Device Sync
projects.description: Led the product strategy and UX design for FanCode's playback continuity and multi-device sync feature, aimed at delivering a seamless, Netflix-level sports viewing experience. Focused on persistent, universally accessible 'Continue Watching' across devices and real-time progress sync, targeting improved retention and engagement for 160M+ monthly users, especially in India's Tier 2/3 markets.
metrics: 50% reduction in registration drop-offs by enabling frictionless onboarding
~25% decrease in checkout abandonment with universal playback sync
Real-time session syncing across devices â€” mobile, web, smart TV
Enhanced user retention through personalized, persistent continue watching rows
highlights: Deep analysis of current UX gaps causing fragmented sports viewing journeys
Designed universal 'Continue Watching' row across mobile, web, and TV platforms
Mapped user journeys for multi-device synchronization with real-time playback position saving
Addressed edge cases like network loss, sync failure, profile differentiation for shared accounts
Focused on ensuring low friction during onboarding and playback resumption to reduce churn
Defined key success metrics including session duration, churn rates, and sync reliability

impact.businessOutcome: Enhanced retention and session times, enabling FanCode to compete with top OTT platforms
impact.userOutcome: Seamless multi-device viewing experience with personalized, persistent playback continuity
impact.skillsDemonstrated: End-to-end product strategy, UX design, user journey mapping, stakeholder alignment

keyFeatures: Persistent 'Continue Watching' section on all platforms with instant access
Automatic playback position saving and cross-device sync
Profile-based experience ensuring accurate progress for shared device users
Low-latency backend for real-time synchronization
Fallback states and offline resilience
UX strategies to increase engagement and reduce friction
